key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on timber and raw materials
Economic sensitivity tied to cyclical construction and packaging industries
Labor shortages and rising labor costs impacting operational efficiency
controversies: Racial harassment allegations at a UFP Industries plant in Ranson, W.Va.
environmental_issues: Potential deforestation and environmental impact from reliance on wood products
social_issues: Racial harassment allegations and potential reputational damage

sources.title: UFP Industries - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: UFP Industries, Inc. is a holding company that serves three markets: retail, industrial and construction. The company is headquartered in Grand Rapids, Michigan, and has been publicly traded (Nasdaq: UFPI) since 1993. UFP Industries has 218 affiliated operations, which supply tens of thousands of products to three markets: UFP Retail, UFP Construction, and UFP Packaging.
